Solar panels: Install solar panels on the roof of your home to harness the power of the sun and use it to heat your home.
Geothermal heating: Use the natural heat from the earth to heat your home by installing a geothermal heating system.
Wood stove: Use a wood stove to heat your home by burning wood in a controlled environment.
Electric heaters: Use electric heaters to heat your home by plugging them into an outlet.
Radiant heating: Use radiant heating to heat your home by installing a system that heats the floors and walls directly.
